sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"; function ProjectCard({title, description, created, onDelete, onEdit, onStart, id}) { const [isEditMode, setIsEditMode] = useState(false) const [newProjectTitle, setNewProjectTitle] = useState(title) const [newProjectDesc, setNewProjectDesc] = useState(description) const handleDeleteClick = () => onDelete(id) const handleStartClick = () => onStart(id) const handleEditClick = () => { setIsEditMode(true) } const handleEditCancel = () => { setNewProjectTitle(title) setNewProjectDesc(description) setIsEditMode(false) } const handleEditSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() onEdit({title: newProjectTitle, description: newProjectDesc, id}) } const onNewTitleInput = (e) => setNewProjectTitle(e.target.value) const onNewDescInput = (e) => setNewProjectDesc(e.target.value) return(
{!isEditMode? ( <>
{title}
{description}
Created on: {created}
):( <>
)}
); } ProjectCard.defaultProps = { title: "", description: "", onDelete: () => {}, onEdit: () => {}, onStart: () => {}, created: Date.now(), id:0 } export default ProjectCard;
